decodeAndGetCECState(Asset storage).details: Decode and load the CECState of the asset

decodeAndGetFinalizedCECState(Asset stor.details: Decode and load the finalized CECState of the asset

encodeAndSetCECTerms(Asset storage,CECTe.details: Tightly pack and store only non-zero overwritten terms (LifecycleTerms)

encodeAndSetCECTerms(Asset storage,CECTe.notice: All non zero values of the overwrittenTerms object are stored. It does not check if overwrittenAttributesMap actually marks attribute as overwritten.
